DOC.brief_title: DNA Analysis Tumor Tissue Samples From Patients With Human Papilloma Virus-Associated Cancer Oropharynx
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Analyze PIK3CA expression mutation p110α amplification expression tumor tissue sample patient human papilloma virus positive ( HPV+ ) human papilloma virus negative ( HPV- ) squamous cell carcinoma ( SCC ) oropharynx . - Determine proliferation survival PI3K inhibition HPV ( + ) HPV ( - ) oropharyngeal SCC cell line HPV E6 E7 express cell . - Determine proliferation survival PI3K inhibition short-term culture tumor tissue sample patient HPV ( + ) HPV ( - ) primary SCC oropharynx . OUTLINE : Previously collect tumor tissue sample analyze HPV DNA PCR amplification direct sequence PCR product ; expression E6 protein relative expression PIK3CA qRT-PCR ; amplification PIK3CA Southern blotting ; mutation PIK3CA ; expression p110α , phospho-AKT , total AKT , FOXO1 polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis ( PAGE ) immunoblotting ; effect PI3K inhibition cell cycle apoptosis flow cytometry . Pharmacological study perform oropharyngeal squamous cell carcinoma cell line short-term culture HPV E6 E7 express cell use LY 294002 vitro analyze response PI3K inhibition . Results response PI3K inhibition correlate HPV status , PIK3CA expression , amplification , mutation , p110α expression . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 20 HPV ( + ) 20 HPV ( - ) tumor tissue specimens patient accrue study .
